name: Solar Temple
description:
A short project made by:

Victor MARCEAU: Story / Game design / Level design/ 3d objects / 2d pictures / Sound design.
Robin METZINGER: Story / Programming

!!!!!!! SOLUTION !!!!!!!

You need a key to open the chest.
Press the second button on the wall on your left
Take the big jump power and go back in the first room
Jump on the chest and on a column to go on the balcony.
Take the fast run power in the little room.
Open the door behind the chest.
Jump, run and take the key.
Go back and open the chest !
You win !
